verbs.description: [ARG0: Avenatti] [V: alleges] [ARG1: that tapes exist of at least one conversation between Trump and Cohen about his client , Stephanie Clifford aka Stormy Daniels] .
Avenatti alleges that [ARG1: tapes] [V: exist] [C-ARG1: of at least one conversation between Trump and Cohen about his client , Stephanie Clifford aka Stormy Daniels] .
